## yorkie variable

The top-level yorkie namespace with additional properties.

In production, this will be called exactly once and the result assigned to the `yorkie` global.

e.g) `yorkie.createClient(...);`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
yorkie: {
    createClient(rpcAddr: string, opts?: ClientOptions | undefined): Client;
    createDocument<T = Indexable>(collection: string, document: string): DocumentReplica<T>;
    Long: Long.LongConstructor;
}
```
